Class BusDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mob41.kmbeta.api.BusDatabase

  • public class BusDatabase
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.json.JSONObject generateDatabase()
      Automatically generates a database, and returns a JSONObject with the database.
      java.util.List<Route> getBusStopRoutes(java.lang.String stopcode)
      Get all routes related to the specified bus stop code (Sub-area)

      Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
      otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
      org.json.JSONObject getPureJSON()
      Gets the pure JSONObject fetched.
      int getRouteIndex(java.lang.String bus_no)
      Get the index inside the routes' names.

      Returns -1 if the specified name isn't found.

      Gets all the routes

      Returns null if database not loaded.

      Get the all the routes' names.

      Returns null if database not loaded.
      java.lang.String getStopCodeFromStopName(java.lang.String routeName, java.lang.String stopname)
      Gets the stop code from a stop name (Chinese or English)

      Returns null if the specified stop name wasn't found.

      Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
      otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
      java.lang.String getStopNameInChineseFromStopCode(java.lang.String routeName, java.lang.String stopcode)
      Gets the stop name in Chinese from a stop code

      Returns null if the specified stop code wasn't found.

      Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
      otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.

      Gets the stop name in English from a stop code

      Returns null if the specified stop code wasn't found.

      Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
      otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
      int getStopSequence(java.lang.String routeName, int boundIndex, java.lang.String stopcode)
      Gets the stop sequence from a stop code

      Returns -1 if the specified stop code wasn't found.

      Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
      otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.

        Returns null if database not loaded.
        Returns:

      • loadDatabase

        public boolean loadDatabase(java.io.InputStream in)
        Loads the database from a InputStream
        Parameters:
        in - The InputStream to be loaded.
        Returns:
        whether the database is loaded successfully or not.

      • loadWebDB

        public boolean loadWebDB()
        Loads the database by downloading the database directly from GitHub
        Returns:
        whether the database is loaded successfully or not.

      • unloadDatabase

        public void unloadDatabase()
        Unloads the database.

      • loadDatabase

        public boolean loadDatabase(java.lang.Object parent,
                            boolean fromClassResources)
        Load database from class-path or file-system

        It is automatically called if the database in the memory is null.
        Must be called before any database reading events.
        Parameters:
        fromClassResources - Load from Class-path
        parent - A class parent to be specified If true, make sure the kmbeta_db.json is attached in the class-path.
        If false, make sure the kmbeta_db.json is inside the working directory.
        Returns:
        Boolean whether the database is successfully loaded.

      • loadDatabase

        public boolean loadDatabase(boolean fromClassResources)
        Load database besides the application or from class resources

        Using BusDatabase.class as the parent
        Parameters:
        fromClassResources - If true, it will load from class-path
        Returns:
        Whether the database loaded successfully or not

      • getBusStopRoutes

        public java.util.List<Route> getBusStopRoutes(java.lang.String stopcode)
                                       throws DatabaseNotLoadedException
        Get all routes related to the specified bus stop code (Sub-area)

        Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
        otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
        Returns:
        a List containing all Route instances related to the specified stop code
        Throws:
        DatabaseNotLoadedException - will only be thrown if a static database isn't loaded.

      • generateDatabase

        public static org.json.JSONObject generateDatabase()
        Automatically generates a database, and returns a JSONObject with the database.
        It will take a while (probably a lot of time) to generate a database.
        Put this into a thread to run.

        Returns null if the generation of database failed.
        Returns:
        a JSONObject containing the database.

      • getStopCodeFromStopName

        public java.lang.String getStopCodeFromStopName(java.lang.String routeName,
                                                java.lang.String stopname)
                                         throws NoSuchRouteException,
                                                DatabaseNotLoadedException
        Gets the stop code from a stop name (Chinese or English)

        Returns null if the specified stop name wasn't found.

        Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
        otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        routeName - The route name
        stopname - The stop name in English or Chinese
        Returns:
        a stop code according to the specified stop name.
        Throws:
        NoSuchRouteException - It is thrown when the specified route can not be found.
        DatabaseNotLoadedException - will only be thrown if a static database isn't loaded.

      • getStopNameInEnglishFromStopCode

        public java.lang.String getStopNameInEnglishFromStopCode(java.lang.String routeName,
                                                         java.lang.String stopcode)
                                                  throws NoSuchRouteException,
                                                         DatabaseNotLoadedException
        Gets the stop name in English from a stop code

        Returns null if the specified stop code wasn't found.

        Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
        otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        routeName - The route name
        stopcode - The stop code of the bus stop
        Returns:
        a stop name in English according to the stop code specified
        Throws:
        NoSuchRouteException - It is thrown when the specified route can not be found.
        DatabaseNotLoadedException - will only be thrown if a static database isn't loaded.

      • getStopNameInChineseFromStopCode

        public java.lang.String getStopNameInChineseFromStopCode(java.lang.String routeName,
                                                         java.lang.String stopcode)
                                                  throws NoSuchRouteException
        Gets the stop name in Chinese from a stop code

        Returns null if the specified stop code wasn't found.

        Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
        otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        routeName - The route name
        stopcode - The stop code of the bus stop
        Returns:
        a stop name in Chinese according to the stop code specified
        Throws:
        NoSuchRouteException - It is thrown when the specified route can not be found.
        DatabaseNotLoadedException - will only be thrown if a static database isn't loaded.

      • getStopSequence

        public int getStopSequence(java.lang.String routeName,
                           int boundIndex,
                           java.lang.String stopcode)
                    throws DatabaseNotLoadedException,
                           NoSuchRouteException
        Gets the stop sequence from a stop code

        Returns -1 if the specified stop code wasn't found.

        Warning: This function requires a static database (Web DB/Offline DB)
        otherwise, a DatabaseNotLoadedException will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        routeName - The route name
        boundIndex - The bound index, probably 0 or 1
        stopcode - The stop code of the bus stop
        Returns:
        The stop sequence of the bus stop.
        Throws:
        NoSuchRouteException - It is thrown when the specified route can not be found.
        DatabaseNotLoadedException - will only be thrown if a static database isn't loaded.

      • getRouteIndex

        public int getRouteIndex(java.lang.String bus_no)
                  throws DatabaseNotLoadedException
        Get the index inside the routes' names.

        Returns -1 if the specified name isn't found.
        Parameters:
        bus_no - The bus name to be searched
        Returns:
        The index of the name.
        Throws:
        DatabaseNotLoadedException - API will try to fetch. It will be thrown only when fetching failed.
